## LdmlKeyboardCompiler.load() method

Loads a LDML Keyboard xml file and compiles into in-memory xml structures.

**Signature:**

```typescript
load(filename: string): LDMLKeyboardXMLSourceFile | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  filename | string | input filename, will use callback to load from disk |

**Returns:**

LDMLKeyboardXMLSourceFile \| null

the source file, or null if invalid
